name: Mountain Cleantech
overview: Mountain Cleantech AG (www.mountain-cleantech.ch) was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in WÃ¤denswil/ Zurich, Switzerland. It is the Investment Advisor of Mountain Cleantech Fund II which focuses on growth equity Cleantech investments in the German-speaking and Nordic regions. The native German-speaking Investment Team combines extensive Operational, Cleantech and Growth Capital investment experience.
